gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `GeneralBankingRisksReserve` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `GeneralBankingRisksReserve` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `GeneralBankingRisksReserveMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_GeneralBankingRisksReserveEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_GeneralBankingRisksReserveEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_GeneralBankingRisksReserveStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_GeneralBankingRisksReserveStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_GeneralBankingRisksReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_GeneralBankingRisksReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`GeneralBankingRisksReserveMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_GeneralBankingRisksReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_GeneralBankingRisksReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfGeneralBankingRisksReserveMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
